Listen, this is a $30 pair of scrubs. I’m won’t pretend that they’re amazing, but they’re dang sure worth the price. Fabric is thin but comfortable, style is cute enough. My only qualm is that the zippers are a bit resistant to zipping, but I’ve had figs zippers break after a few washes too.
